name: Peppermint Butler
ability: The first time a Creature you control is destroyed on your turn >>> Deal 2 Damage to a Creature an opponent controls.

name: Dark-o-Mint
ability: When this is destroyed, your opponent must discard 2 cards.

name: Terrible Tower
ability: Destroy your Creature on this Landscape, FLOOP >>> Play the top 2 cards of your deck.

name: Tools of the Trade
ability: Each of your Creatures has +1 ATK this turn. If an opponent's Creature is defeated this turn, ignore its text.

name: Ice Queen
ability: During each opponent's turn, Creatures you control with no Damage on them have +1 ATK.

name: Cinnamon Bun
ability: Once during your turn, you may deal 2 Damage to one of your Creatures and gain 2 HP.

name: The Lich
ability: Once during your turn, you may destroy a Creature you control to gain 1 Action.

name: Whims of Fate
ability: Flip a coin. If heads, destroy a Creature you control. If tails, place a Creature in your discard pile onto an empty Landscape you control.

name: Ancient Comet
ability: Flip a coin. If heads, deal 2 Damage to each of your Creatures. If tails, your Creatures get +2 ATK this turn.

name: Monolith of Doom
ability: If your Creature in this Lane is destroyed, destroy Monolith of Doom and all Creatures in all Lanes.

name: Neptr
ability: Once during each of your turns, you may discard the top card of your deck. If it was a Creature, put it into your hand.

name: Berserk Bakery
ability: Once during your turn, you may discard a card from your hand to put a token on this. FLOOP >>> Deal 1 Damage to the opposing Creature in this Lane for each token on Berserk Bakery.

name: Infinite Pies
ability: Discard the top card of your deck. If it was a Creature, deal 2 Damage to an opponent and you may play this Spell again.

name: Crust Crusher
ability: This can be on a Landscape with another Creature. When the other Creature on this Landscape is dealt Damage, deal it to Crust Crusher instead.

name: Party_God
ability: When a Creature you control moves, it has +1 ATK this turn.

name: Party Energy
ability: Move all of your Creatures to new Lanes. Each Creature that moved gets +2 ATK this turn.

name: Party Oasis
ability: FLOOP >>> Move a Creature from this Lane to an empty Lane. You may move another Creature you control to this Lane.

name: Bongo Bounce House
ability: When you would be dealt Damage, deal that Damage to Bongo Bounce House instead.

name: Death
ability: Once during your turn, you may turn a Landscape you control face down to deal 4 Damage to your opponent.

name: Ancient Healer
ability: When this is played on a facedown Landscape, turn it face up and heal 4 HP.

name: Last Will & Detriment
ability: Put this under an opposing Creature. If the Creature is destroyed, deal 5 Damage to your opponent.

name: Creepy Crypt
ability: When your Creature in this Lane leaves play, deal its ATK to your opponent.

name: James Baxter
ability: Once during your turn, you may draw a card. If you do, your opponent may draw a card.

name: Beach Ball
ability: Gain 4 HP. Draw a card. You may put this into an opponent's hand. If you do, draw another card.

name: Dressage Dance Hall
ability: This counts as a copy of your Landscape in this Lane.

name: Happy Ghost Lucky
ability: When this enters play, and when it Attacks, you may look at the top card of your deck. If it is a Rainbow card, you may put it into your hand.

name: 10th Anniversary Backer
ability: The first time you play a KICKSTARTER card on your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a KICKSTARTER card, draw it.
